pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-5868:Set 'outputURIPrefix' to empty string if it's not set
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Set 'outputURIPrefix' to empty string if it's not set
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: Can you put this into a separate test method? The current method name - "testLoadStepRunnerParameters" - is fairly vague as to what it's testing. This change really calls for a new test method that is scoped to outputURIPrefix - the name could just be "testOutputURIPrefix", and it would include these scenarios pertaining to outputURIPrefix.
